hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: At Sisonke, we take pride in our commitment to community empowerment, connection, and growth in South African townships.

AboutUs.WhoWeAreDescription: Sisonke is a community-driven platform connecting local resources, opportunities, and people in South African townships.
AboutUs.WhatWeDoDescription: We provide a digital hub for job listings, events, forums, and local business promotion to empower our community.
AboutUs.HowWeHelpDescription: Through our platform, we facilitate connections, share knowledge, and create opportunities for growth and development.
AboutUs.CreateSuccessStoriesDescription: By bringing together community members, businesses, and resources, we help individuals achieve their goals and thrive.

name: Name
termsIntro: By using Sisonke, you agree to the following:
userConductDesc: Follow all laws and respect others in the community.
accountSecurityDesc: Keep your account info secure and notify us of any breaches.
contentResponsibilityDesc: You own your content. We are not liable for it.
serviceLimitationsDesc: We are not responsible for service interruptions or errors.
privacyDesc: Your data is protected. See our Privacy Policy for details.
modificationsDesc: We may update these terms. Continued use means acceptance.
inquiries: For inquiries, contact us at info@sisonke.co.za
